meanings.definition: A type of joint in which a peg-like structure fits into a socket.
meanings.sent1: The gomphoses of the tooth securely fit into the jawbone socket.
meanings.sent2: Dentists study the gomphoses to understand tooth structure and placement.
meanings.sent3: The gomphoses of the puzzle piece made it impossible to fit in the wrong spot.
meanings.sent4: The gomphoses of the key in the lock clicked perfectly into place.
meanings.sent5: The gomphoses of the door hinge ensured a smooth swing every time.
